div.p:
Curia Capitalis de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per
balliuos eiusdem xxvijo die mensis aprilis anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo
nono quo die sectis vocatis et Curia affirmata absentes patent in
Rutulo secte

Eodem die actio debatalis debatabilis inter Rectorem de oyne ex vna et magistrum
Jacobum Innes ex altera penes arrestam factam super xlv marcas monete
scocie in manibus Andree Wentone cum consensu parcium continuatur vsque in feriam
quintam proxime sequentem sub spe concordie

The samyn day comperit Richerd Wricht with alexander chamer of murchil forspekar
ande schew that Alexander Rolland' tollar occupeit ane half tenment and
land' pertening to him heretable' and now he was informit the said alexander
prepost him to mak ane pretendit alienacione and disposicion of the saide
land' in his skath quharfor he protestit Solemptlie quhat euir the said
Alexander did tharintile suld' turne him to nay preiudice

the samyn day comperit Jonhne Waus and mastir Androw cadiow his forspekar
follouit Walter auchneyf William futhes Robert crage Jonhne Crag grige
and William robert buchan taxtaris of the last taxt tile ansuer tile ane borghe'
strekit one thaim be the said Jonhne and certan vthiris of his nichtbouris
for the wranguis' taxing' of thame hear thand thar gudis ixtendis
the quhilk passit tile the decisione of the court quhilk riplie avisit
fand' ande deliuerit the said borghe' of nane availe strintht force nor
effecte and the said personis quyt of his challance

The said day the aldirman and balyeis gert cale diuers' tymes the acturnays
and procuratouris of Agnes colp and margaret colp to comper thar to her' se and
vndirstand' Justice to be done and equaly ministerit to thame anent the
xviij li' clamyt apon' Alexander matheson' eftir the tenour of ane bref
of compulsion direct to tham tharapon' obefor And' thar comperit the saide Alexander
and Alexander Rede his forspekar and denyit that yhe aucht ony thinge to
the saide Agnes and margaret offering him redy to vndirly the decision'
and knavlege of ane assis' vnsuspect tharanent or ane decision' of the
Courte eftir the tenor' of the breyfis of compulsion' direkit tharvpone

Eodem die dominus Dauid Waus procurator dominj Alexander vocat capellanum altaris beati Niniani
accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu vj s' viij d' sibi et dicto altari
debit' de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in le gastraw inter terram hered' quondam
andree baxter ex australi et terram Johannis myle ex boreali ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in
Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Willelmo ranison thoma buchane
et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholson capellanus ac procurator altaris
Beati petri apostolorum principis protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu sex s' sibi et
dicto altari debit' de quadam terra jacente infra dictum burgum in le gastraw inter
terram hered' quondam Andree baxtar ex australi et terram Johannis myle ex boriali
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
ballivis in sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
Willelmo ranisone thoma buchan et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die magister Andreas cadiow accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno
annuo Redditu vi s' et viij d' sibj debit' de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum
in le hukasterraw inter terram Dauid hile ex orientali et terram patricij coupar ex bo occidentali
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Dauid hile
Johanne brogane et Alexandro allansone seriando

Eodem die dominus Willelmus crukschank capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Duthacci
accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu quinque s' sibi et dicto
altari debit' annuatim de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico
superiore ecclesie inter terram thome mar' ex australi et terram thome prat ex orientali
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus Willelmo ra
nison' thoma buchan et Duncano Straloche seriando

Eodem die dominus Willelmus crukschank capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Duthacci acce
dens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu sex s' et octo d' sibi et
dicto altari debit' annuatim de quadam terra vasta Jacente in le skulhill inter terram
magistri Duncani scherar ex orientali et terram thome meldrum ex occidentali et
communionem viam regiam ex australi et terram Andree michelson ex boriali ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in
sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo ranison'
thoma buchane et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die Dauid murray accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu
duorum s' sibi debit' de quodam orto vasto Jacente extra le bolbrige inter terram Willelmi abir
kirdour ex orientali et croftum fratrum carmelitarum ex occidentali partibus ex altera ad
quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus thoma Rolland
Willelmo gibsone et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes penny prior fratrum predica
torum ac procurator eiusdem et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu sex s' et viij d' sibi et dicto
loco pertinen' annuatim de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie inter terram thome mar
ex australi et terram thome prat ex orientali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die huius
processus testibus Alexandro lammyntone Alexandro Jofray et Alexandro allanson seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram thomas Rolland et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu
quinque s' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram Dauid prat ex australi et terram eduardi top ex boriali partibus ex
altera et communionem viam regiam ex orientali et lacum dicti burgi versus occidens Ad quam terram acce
dens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Roberto talyour thoma buchan et
Duncano straloche seriando

The samyn day Androw cantuly was callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer tile ane borghe' strekit apone him be Dauid hile fo in the handis of
thome Jamesone officiar for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xi stane of woll
that he suld haf deliuerit to him at beltane bigan of the rest of ane mair some
quhairfor the balyeis chargit to distrenye him and latt his pvnd to borghe
gif it be askit and warne him to the next lauchfule court hireftir as secunde
day of process'
Curia balliuorum tenta quarto die mensis maij Anno quo supra

the samyn day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of the consale ordanit Da
uid prat to pay thome prat fiwe markis for ane hors' quhilk Robert prat
his fadir quhome god assoilye left to Sanct Nicholace werk

the action' debatabile betuix Agnes menyeis and Williame portar is continewit
quhile this day viij days with consent of batht the partiis quhilk day salbe
day of peremptour to decide the debatab debat betuix thaim anent the fischingis
of crowis

the samyn day Aly byrs' grantit to pay Androw branche the bailye alsmekile
siluer for xlix stane of Rasynnis that scho resauit fra him as Jonhne Rede wile
depone be his aith' to the quhilk the said balye consentit

the samyn day thome chavmer litstar grantit him avand to Androw branche the balye
xxxv s' and iiij d' of the rest of ane pip of wad the quhilkis the balyeis chargit
him to pay within terme of law

The samyn day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day aucht dais to
James leslie to preyf ane vthir fear of the Inland liand in the castalgate
one the southt fra his forland thane Dauid simsone

The samyn day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit Duncan straloche seriand to warne
Alexander gray to comper befor thame this day aucht dais to ansuer tile ane
borghe strekit apone him be patrik wys' for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him
of vij s' as day of peremptoure

the samyn day Jonhne quhithede grantit to pay Androu Waus alsmekile siluer
for ane barrele of vnyonnis fra him as the lakast of the samyne
barellis gaf
In presens of Androu branche the bailye

In the bailye court of abirdene haldin the xi day of maij the yer forsaide
Jonhne fechat sone and ayr to vmquhile Nichole fechat was maid quyt
of al ayrschip clamyt be Jonhne Waus sone and ayr to vmquhile
gilbert Waus be the saide Jonhne fechatis aith' becaus' it was referrit
tharto be ane decret gevin tharapone be sere Dauid Waus vicar of banf
In presens of Jonhne Waus brothir to the lard of many and procuratour that
follouit the saide Jonhne fechat for the said ayrschipe

the samyn day it was fundin' and deliuerit be ane suorne assis' be the
moutht of mastir Androw cadiow that the assedacione maid be vmquhile
Williame moyses to Adam andirsone and producit in Jugement be William
portar anent ane auchtane partis fischingis of the crovis is of waile
and the said William portar sal Joys' the said fischingis for al the termes contenit
in the samyn that is to say to the vigile of Sanct Androw next hereftir

The said day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Alexander Red tailsman
that Duncan of lammyntone and Alexander findelaw si or quhilk of thaim that is best bodin'
sal pay to Ranalde Dys' four pundis and vij s' of vsual money of Scotland
for wederis bocht fra him

The samyn day Androu Cantuly callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer tile ane borghe'
strekit apone him be Dauid hile in the handis of thome Jamesone seriande for the
wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xi peter of wole of the rest of ane mair Some
tharfor the balyeis chargit the saide officiar to distrenye him and latt his punde
to borghe' gif it be askit and warne him to the next lauchfule day thareftir
as the thride day of process
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio duodecimo die maij Anno quo supra

the samyn day it was adiugit be the Court witht consent of batht the partiis
that Androu brynne salbe quyt of Androu lousonis' challance of xl s'
vnto the tyme he be pait of his Costis and skathis ande follouit agan be ane
new burghe'

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis' thomas prat tailsman that Richerd
Waus has done to Androu Wentone that he aw to do anent the waring'
of xv frankis And the saide Androuys aventour' is gane

The xiiij day of maij the yer forsaid It was ordanit fundin and deliuerit be the
aldirman ballieis and diuers' of the consale that Androu Wentone sal haue
fiftene frankis waring' of quhet out of the nicholes' the keruele callit Nicho
lace of abirdene Ande he sal fynd Souerte to ansuer to William gareache and to do
tile him for the said quhet that he aw to do of law And' thareftir the said Androw
fand Jonhne colisone souerte to the ballieis tharfor and the said Androw oblist
him be his hand to freith the saide Jonhne tharanent

In the bailye Court of abirdene the xviij day of may the yer forsaid Androw
Wyntone fand thome Wodman souerte be his hand to be responsale and ansuer
to Williame gareache mydlar for fiftene frankis waring' of quhet as law
wile and to pay alsmekile for Ilkan boll of the said quhet that salhappyne
to be Recouerit be the law fra the said Androu as ony quhet beis sauld
that come in the said Schip in girnaile
